name: Dice Roller Game
description:
University Assignment to learn how to program within Unreal using C++ and Animation Sequences.

Play with a friend and be the first to 21 to win! Names are randomly generated from a list in the code. 

At the end of the game, it says to hit 'ESC' to leave, but that does not work in the .exe

Controls

Mouse - look around the area

'Tab' key - to start input

'y' or 'n' keys - inputs on to roll again or not

Alt - F4 - Quit game
